feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 12:05PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...INCREASED FIRE DANGER THIS COMING WEEK... Conditions remain dry across Southeast Alaska and temperatures will rise to the upper 70s across much of the region over the next few days. Fine fuels are dry and there is a risk of camp fires getting out of control. Winds will remain light, which is a mitigating circumstance working in our favor.
